description: Try our easy to follow Pear Tarte Tatin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear Tarte Tatin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet frozen ready rolled shortcrust pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Brush 20cm cake pan with melted butter and line base and sides with baking paper.
Cut pears into quarters, retaining stalks, core and thinly slice. Place into a bowl, cover with cold water and add a squeeze of lemon juice to prevent from browning.

Put sugar into a large non-stick frying pan. Cook over a low heat for 15-20 minutes, shaking pan occasionally, until sugar is completely melted and caramel in colour. Remove from heat and add butter. Stir until well combined. Pour toffee over the base of prepared pan.

Drain pears and arrange over base of cake pan, on top of caramel, overlapping slightly. Lay pastry over pears, folding excess in towards centre. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until pastry is browned and crisp.
Stand for 5 minutes before inverting onto a serving plate. Serve immediately with ice-cream.
